Package bigshot

Contains classes for image transformation, as well as image pyramid and VR cube generation.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
EquirectangularToCubic Transforms an equirectangular image map to rectilinear images.
FastTrigInverse Fast inverse trigonometric functions based on lookup tables and linear interpolation between lookup table values.
FastTrigInverse.FastAcos Fast inverse-cosine.
FastTrigInverse.FastAtan Fast inverse-cosine.
Image A 30-bit (10 per channel) RGB image.
MakeImagePyramid Command-line tool to creates the tiled image pyramids that are used by Bigshot.
MathUtil Math utility functions.
Point3D A 3D point
Point3DTransform A 3x3 matrix transform.
 

Package bigshot Description

Contains classes for image transformation, as well as image pyramid and VR cube generation.

See Also:
EquirectangularToCubic
